server.name: io.github.VictoriaMetrics-Community/mcp-victorialogs
server.description: MCP Server for VictoriaLogs. Provides integration with VictoriaLogs API and documentation

environmentVariables.description: URL to VictoriaMetrics instance (it should be root URL of vmlingle or vlselect), for example http://localhost:9428 or https://play-vmlogs.victoriametrics.com
environmentVariables.name: VL_INSTANCE_ENTRYPOINT

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tools to disable
environmentVariables.name: MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS
